trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Sunbury
There were no other sightings in Sunbury on or around October 5th 2008
Summary: Seen star like object hovering from the north west to south east no blinking lights whats so ever
divs: Sighting DetailsVery Strange star like orb was spotted tonight and dissipated in mid air when I went off my porch to see where it was heading I thought at first it was a plain but I noticed when it got a little closer it looked to be in my own words a star like orb and it was hovering very weird I went to get my mother to come and look at what I was seeing and when I ran back off the porch it was gone I live in Pa, and this is not my first sighting before seeing that what I call a orb looked to be flickering lights in the night sky sometimes out of the corner of my eyes and at times dead
